_comment: Sample GloBI dataset descriptor. See http://github.com/globalbioticinteractions for more information.
citation: Giovanni Strona, Maria Lourdes D. Palomares, Nicolas Bailly, Paolo Galli, and Kevin D. Lafferty. 2013. Host range, host ecology, and distribution of more than 11800 fish parasite species. Ecology 94:544. http://dx.doi.org/10.1890/12-1419.1 .
